title: PromptIntel
description:
This connector imports adversarial AI prompt intelligence from PromptIntel (https://promptintel.novahunting.ai). PromptIntel is a collaborative threat intelligence platform for tracking and defending against adversarial AI prompts â€” Indicators of Prompt Compromise (IoPC).

For each prompt the connector creates:
- An AI-Prompt observable with the raw prompt text
- A STIX Indicator with pattern [ai-prompt:value = '...']
- A based-on relationship between the indicator and the observable
- When a Nova rule is present: a Nova indicator (pattern_type=nova) and a sighting

Labels are derived from PromptIntel categories (manipulation, abuse, patterns, outputs), threat types, and tags. Scores are computed from severity level and community ratings.
short_description: Imports adversarial AI prompt intelligence (IoPC) from PromptIntel as AI-Prompt observables and indicators.
